Package me.aecsocket.calibre.item.component

Class CalibreComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aecsocket.calibre.item.component.CalibreComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, AcceptsCalibrePlugin, CalibreIdentifiable, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.ComponentHolder<CalibreComponentSlot>, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.item.Item, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.item.ItemStackFactory, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.registry.Identifiable
    public class CalibreComponent
extends Object
implements CalibreIdentifiable, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.component.ComponentHolder<CalibreComponentSlot>, Cloneable, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.item.Item
    Calibre's implementation of a component. Stores systems and stats.

      • setHidden

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack setHidden​(CalibrePlugin plugin,
                                                       org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                                                       boolean hidden)
        Modifies a flag of an item which makes it hidden to the player who holds it. Items with this flag do not appear during item animations.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The CalibrePlugin.
        item - The item to modify. The reference passed will not be cloned.
        hidden - Enables the flag or not.
        Returns:
        The modified item.
        See Also:
        isHidden(CalibrePlugin, ItemStack)

      • isHidden

        public static boolean isHidden​(CalibrePlugin plugin,
                               org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Gets if the specified item has a flag which makes it hidden to the player who holds it.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The CalibrePlugin.
        item - The item to check.
        Returns:
        If the flag is enabled.
        See Also:
        setHidden(CalibrePlugin, ItemStack, boolean)
